string.text: Mob Hit
Sultan has sent me to eliminate some bum, then return for my payment.

See this list? This is a list of rats I need exterminated. 
 
...Cheapskates who chose to cut and run rather than pay their debts. 
 
...Misers who answered with bullets when my boys begged them for bread. 
 
...Bitches and traitors that left Dark Valley to kowtow to Rostok or Sidorovich. 
 
They can all go fuck themselves. Here; a name off my list. I'd like you to let me know when I can cross it out.
Ah, cold satisfaction. I like it when shit goes down smoothly. Here, a token of my gratitude.
Eliminate the Military Presence
Sultan wants me to eliminate a nearby Military patrol before they do something stupid.

Those Military fucks are creeping around here again. Most likely to harass our tenants, or take another crack at the nearby lab... \n \n...morons. Those bitches are already dead men walking, but I'll pay you remove them before their idiocy hurts anyone I know.
You've impressed me, stalker. Wish more of the boys around here had your spunk.
Stalker Elimination
Sultan has sent me to enact vengeance on some stalkers that harassed one of his boys.

Alright, listen up. A group of stalkers tried to gang up on one of my boys not too long ago. Luckily he escaped, and is busy recovering in the medical hangar, but we can't let that kind of disrespect go. \n \nYou might need to round up your own posse before you take them on, but these guys tried to massacre my boy. Show them what happens to chucklefucks who try that.
Done? ...Good.
Collect patches
Sultan asked me to collect patches
It's time to remind those retards who the bandits really are. I've got a good mind as to how we'll do this; just tear off their patches and bring them to me, and I'll handle the rest.
Got them? Great work! Here's your payout.
Eviction Notice
Sultan wants me to drive off the squatters on his farm.

Here's a job for you; some squatters have moved into my farm down south. They refuse to pay rent, and are even scaring prospective tenants away. This simply won't do. Go take some guys and politely escort them out, won't you?
So they tried to pay you with bullets, huh? Typical free loaders. As for you, here's your props.
Night Terror
Sultan wants me to get rid of a dangerous monster.
Another nightmare has managed to worm its way out of the local lab. Tore up of the younger boys real good. I'll give you its last known location. Go find it and kick its ass.
Maybe that'll teach those dumb mutants not to mess with us. Anyway, here's your reward.
Eliminate Mutant Threat in Dark Valley
Olivius has sent me to do some housecleaning. I should return to him for payment once I've cleared the mutants off the marked area.

Yeah, stalkers aren't moving in as often anymore. Why? Because they see the mutants, shit themselves, then leave. If this keeps happening, we won't be able to collect rent, borrow goods... you get the picture? It's time to give the Valley a spring clean.
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Turf War
I've agreed to stick up a stalker camp for Olivius. He mentioned that I might need to bring friends.

This one is a real cinch. Sultan's got a mind to shake down a nearby stalker camp; shake things up, remind them who's in charge around here. You'll need to get your own little gang together for this, but there's big props in it for you if you can pull it off.
Ha! Well done! I hope you stripped off all the loot you could; here's a little extra from me.
Chiki-Briki i v Damke
I've been hired to guide a bandit gang around as they "borrow" from local stalkers.
There are a few guys who've been needing someone to take them shopping, if you catch my drift. Scout out some prime targets for them, and you'll get a nice cut when the job is done.
Nice take, eh? Here is your cut.
Hit Man
Olivius has contracted me to run a hit on some poor sucker, then return for payment.
I've got a list of people who've rubbed me the wrong way. I want you to rub one of them out. What do you say?
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Here is what I promised.
Find Drug-making kit for the Bandit medic in Dark Valley
Drug-making kit is required by the bandits medic to work on medical supplies. I should bring them back to him if I find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily basis is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.
Great job! I owe you big time.
